sentences.sContent: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.sCn: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

sentences.sContent: ...allowing travelers to compare flight and hotel prices with the click of a mouse...
...Other studies show that simply providing the facility for people to compare their energy use with the local average is enough to cause them to modify their behaviour...
...you have to compare new information against knowledge you've already mastered...
...give learners the chance to compare and contrast good and bad solutions to the problems...
...the important aspect is to compare with an appropriate reference group...
...in that we evaluate ourselves in terms of how we compare to others...
...When you compare students of equivalent intelligence and past academic achievements...
...And how does it compare with the other...

remMethod.val: com(一起) ＋ pare(看作pair， 对) → 把这对一起比较 → 比照， 对照

trans.tranCn: 比较， 对照； 把…比作
trans.tranOther: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different
